description:
iGIZMO goes travel-tastic this issue with a package of holiday tips, gadgets and games. Where to go, what to pack, what to do – we’ve got just the ticket for you…

READ
• Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 exclusive first look: starry-eyed slate goes big
• Cases for places: the ultimate packing advice for any holiday
• The world’s longest bridge, Nite’s tough nut watch, Renault’s gadget car and more…  

WATCH
• We review the world’s first 3D mobile from LG 
• Expert advice on how to pack your suitcase, no matter where you jet off to
• The Augmented Reality cinema app that brings cities to life

PLAY
• Spot the difference or guess the gadget games to keep you entertained on your travels
• Get up close and personal with time travelling watches
• Give Panasonic’s GF3 a spin with our 360 photos
